taggroup.name: srid
taggroup.description: The Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID) of the spatial coverage of the resource EPSG format (open group with some predefined tags).

taggroup.name: conformity
taggroup.description: This is a citation of the implementing rules adopted under Article 7(1) of Directive 2007/2/EC or other specification to which a particular resource conforms. (fixed group)

taggroup.name: language
taggroup.description: The language(s) used within the resource or in which the metadata elements are expressed.  The value domain of this tag is limited to the languages defined in ISO 639-2.

type.name: external data

taggroup.name: resource type
taggroup.description: SIP internal type of the resource (fixed group).

type.description: This is data available as open data from any source on the Internet in a format, which can be directly used in experiments in the Laboratory.

topiccategory.name: climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere

taggroup.name: topic category
taggroup.description: High-level classification of resources in accordance with ISO 19115 for grouping and topic-based search (fixed group).

topiccategory.description: processes and phenomena of the atmosphere. Examples: cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation

role.name: originator

taggroup.name: role
taggroup.description: Function performed by the responsible party (fixed group, standard codelist).

role.description: Party that created the resource. Person of organization that created the data resource. Can be the same as author, but in cases when a data resource is based on other resources, the creator cannot be the author.

type.name: original data

taggroup.name: representation type
taggroup.description: SIP internal type of the representation of the resource (fixed group).

type.description: The representation holds the original data of the resource

protocol.name: WWW:LINK-1.0-http--link

taggroup.name: protocol
taggroup.description: Protocol of the service that can be accessed at the contentLocation of the resource representation (open group with several predefined tags from standard codelists).

protocol.description: Web Address (URL), should be used when no further information about the resource is available

type.name: lineage meta-data

taggroup.name: meta-data type
taggroup.description: SIP internal type of the Meta-Data Record (fixed group).

type.description: Type of the Meta-Data Record. "lineage meta-data" refers to meta-data about the lineage of the resource, e.g. a protocol of an experiment.

taggroup.name: language
taggroup.description: The language(s) used within the resource or in which the metadata elements are expressed.  The value domain of this tag is limited to the languages defined in ISO 639-2.

taggroup.name: access limitations
taggroup.description: Limitations on public access in accordance to Article 13 of Directive 2007/2/EC (fixed group with tags from a standard codelist).
